properties.areaDesc: Grand Marais to Whitefish Point MI
properties.headline: Gale Warning issued January 8 at 10:56AM EST until January 9 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Marquette MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning, southeast winds 20 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 45 kt and waves 3 to 6 feet expected. For the
Small Craft Advisory, north winds 15 to 25 kt with gusts up to
30 kt and waves 6 to 9 feet occurring.

* WHERE...Grand Marais to Whitefish Point MI.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 4 AM to 7 PM EST Thursday.
For the Small Craft Advisory, until 7 PM EST this evening.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 7 PM EST THURSDAY
